resource.chars:
This much being premised 
in order that the Committee of 
Papers may form their own 
judgment as to the extent 
to which my opinion is likely 
to be prejudiced, I may 
say, that both as regards 
manner & matter, Mr Flowers 
Memoir appears to me to be 
eminently worthy of a place 
in the Philosophical Transactions 
Wisely avoiding even the 
appearance of entering into 
controversial discussions
